30#include <sys/param.h>
31#include <sys/types.h>
32#include <limits.h>
33#include <unistd.h>
34
35#include "sanity.h"
36#include "user.h"
37
38/* ---------------------------------------------------------------------
39 * Free functions.
40 * --------------------------------------------------------------------- */
41
42uid_t
43atf_user_euid(void)
44{
45 return geteuid();
46}
47
48bool
49atf_user_is_member_of_group(gid_t gid)
50{
51 static gid_t groups[NGROUPS_MAX];
52 static int ngroups = -1;
53 bool found;
54 int i;
55
56 if (ngroups == -1) {
57 ngroups = getgroups(NGROUPS_MAX, groups);
58 INV(ngroups >= 0);
59 }
60
61 found = false;
62 for (i = 0; !found && i < ngroups; i++)
63 if (groups[i] == gid)
64 found = true;
65 return found;
66}
67
68bool
69atf_user_is_root(void)
70{
71 return geteuid() == 0;
72}
73
74bool
75atf_user_is_unprivileged(void)
76{
77 return geteuid() != 0;
78}
